name: Flavors of Brazil
description:
Brazil have incredible beaches, a rich culture and delicious dishes.
Can you help a portuguese chef learn some great brazilian recipes?
Let's join him in this amazing adventure through the Brazil and learn some recipes while playing.

9 MINIGAMES
Have fun in these games and unlock famous brazilian recipes.

9 BRAZILIAN RECIPES
- Acarajé
- Brigadeiro e Beijinho
- Pão de Queijo
- Tucunaré no Escabeche
- Baião de Dois
- Bolo de Rolo
- Caribéu
- Bauru
- Churrasco Gaúcho

DISCOVER THE BRAZIL
Meet ficticious chefs from many states who will tell you about his cultures and awesome places to travel.
developers: Ludic Side Tecnologia da Informacao LTDA
publishers: Ludic Side Tecnologia da Informacao LTDA
